message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $10,000?

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $10,000 just doesn't work for me.  How about we split the difference?  I'm willing to come down to $10,750.  This is still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,250. Can you meet me at this price?
